thread.title: Kathy Monroy
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Kathy Monroy

author: Kathy Monroy
title: Kathy Monroy
text: I am new to Kayla's program, but a very helpful lady posted a somewhat negative review about the app. Mainly the high price was the issue. So she put a link to the e-books discount site. At $40 for the fil 12 weeks I decided to give it a go. I used my credit card to make sure I was covered if anything should go wrong, but in less than one minute after pressing purchase I had the download links in my inbox. Super fast! I fully recommend going this route if you are interested in this program. Thank you!
